Package au.csiro.pathling.views.validation

Annotation Interface UniqueColumnNames

@Documented @Constraint(validatedBy=UniqueColumnNamesValidator.class) @Target(TYPE) @Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface UniqueColumnNames
Validation constraint that ensures all Column names within a FhirView are unique.

This constraint is applied at the class level to FhirView objects to validate that all columns defined within the view have unique names. This is essential for:

  • Preventing ambiguity when referencing columns by name
  • Ensuring valid SQL generation (as SQL requires unique column names)
  • Maintaining data integrity in the view definition

The validation is performed by UniqueColumnNamesValidator, which collects all column names from the view and checks for duplicates. If duplicates are found, a detailed error message is generated listing the duplicate column names.

See Also:
  • UniqueColumnNamesValidator
  • FhirView
  • Column

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    Class<?>[]
    groups
    The validation groups this constraint belongs to.
    String
    message
    Error message template to use when the validation fails.
    Class<? extends jakarta.validation.Payload>[]
    payload
    Payload that can be attached to a constraint declaration.

  • Element Details

    • message

      String message
      Error message template to use when the validation fails.

      The default message is overridden by the validator with a more specific message that includes details about which column names are duplicated.

      Returns:
      the error message template
      Default:
      "Column names must be unique within a view"

    • groups

      Class<?>[] groups
      The validation groups this constraint belongs to.
      Returns:
      the validation groups
      Default:
      {}

    • payload

      Class<? extends jakarta.validation.Payload>[] payload
      Payload that can be attached to a constraint declaration.
      Returns:
      the payload
      Default:
      {}
